sense.def:
A piece of something
je del, delež ali odsek nečesa.

seg.quote: He came back dragging a great big piece of a tree.
She cut the cake and gave me a piece.
He tore both letters into small pieces.

sense.def:
A piece of something
je tudi posamezni primerek ali sestavni del tiste stvari.

seg.quote: The only piece of clothing she bought was a jumper.

sense.def:
Izraz
piece
uporabljamo ob neštevnih samostalnikih za poimenovanje posamezne skupine dejstev, posameznega dejanja ali izdelka.

A piece
je tudi nekaj, kar je napisano ali ustvarjeno, na primer članek, umetniško ali glasbeno delo.

seg.quote: It was a classic piece called Forever Is For Us.

sense.def:
Pieces
so tudi kovanci z določeno vrednostjo. Na primer,
a 10p piece
je kovanec, vreden deset penijev.

seg.quote: ...a lighter that was no bigger than a 50p piece.

sense.def:
The pieces
so pri družabnih igrah predmeti, ki jih premikamo po igralni plošči.

Kadar je oseba ali stvar po nevarnih okoliščinah še vedno
in one piece
, ni poškodovana ali prizadeta.

To go to pieces
pomeni, da se ne obvladamo več, ker smo živčni ali razburjeni;

To tear someone to pieces
ali
to pull someone's work to pieces
pomeni zelo ostro kritizirati nekoga ali njegovo delo;

To piece together the truth about something
pomeni postopoma odkriti resnico o nečem.

seg.quote: She had not yet been able to piece together exactly what had happened.

sense.def:
To piece something together
pomeni postopoma urediti sestavne dele nečesa v celoto.

seg.quote: She pieced together the torn-up drawing.
